summary:
During the last 20 years I have developed myself from an IT technical expert to an experienced Project Manager to a Program Manager in a wide spectrum of the Information and Communication Technology, with a strong affinity with Software Quality and Software Delivery. Over the last few years the project focus area expanded towards business driven projects, such as Compliance, Service Delivery and Patient Management.

My motivation has always been to look for solutions for a myriad of challenges from the perspective of a manager and leader, both in program management as in the technical arena, while closely working together with specialists.

Due to my strong analytical capabilities I am able to quickly adapt to various industries and technologies.

profile_positions.description:
Within the Digital Innovation & Delivery department I have successfully managed a variety of large scale, high risk projects. One of the initial projects was the preparation of the organization towards GDPR with a very clear and fixed deadline. The challenge in this project for Office Depot was the lack of a clear and complete overview of all applications and systems impacted by the data protection and privacy regulation changes. The coordination and planning of the investigation and inventory to get to such an artifact was therefore part of the scope of my project. 
Beside the GDPR project which touched basically every department and individual in the organization I managed a couple of other large scale projects in the Compliance domain, such as PCI Compliance and VAT regulation. I also managed projects in the Finance area, such as 445-to-MonthEnd reporting implementation and in the Supply Chain Management domain, such as the Import/Export process improvement project.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager-Business Improvement Office

profile_positions.description:
At Océ (part of the Canon Group) Manufacturing & Logistics, processes and supply chains are designed and implemented to produce and distribute advanced printing systems and software to customers worldwide. To ensure delivery of the very best quality and performance the Master Data & License management team focuses on software and hardware licenses (revenues) and Master Data management. 

As a team lead I inspire and motivate my team members, enabling the best team performance.  pro-actively develop the strengths of every individual, reaching their full potential.

Next to my team lead responsibility, I develop and implement the License strategy, meeting defined technological and commercial requirements of R&D, IT and Marketing departments. I drive license related projects, the International License Management system and I ensure conformity and co-development of License management over all Océ sites (Germany, Canada and the Netherlands). Moreover I am the main point of contact for internal stakeholders and the Canon Sales regions worldwide (EMEA, Japan, Australia, USA, etc.).

Together with my team I translate commercial product structures into the configuration of the international License Management system and SAP, supporting product introductions and improvement projects. I enable Canon regions to sell products with the needed configurations and licenses. On top of this I identify opportunities for improvement, secure knowledge of systems and processes and ensure continuous development of License and Data Management.
profile_positions.title: Team Lead Master Data & License Management

profile_positions.description:
As a Program Manager I was responsible for the implementation and management of the Patient Liaison Officer Program for the 470 Air Base Squadron/Medical Flight (3 FTE). Aside from this, I assisted in the management of the PLO Program at the 52 Fighter Wing/Medical Group in Spangdahlem, Germany (9 FTE).
In the role of Program Manager I have setup a program to develop a platform that supports the PLO Program online. Scope of the program was the design, build, test and deployment of the software capabilities to monitor and track Patient contact information, monitor and track Patient Cases and track Patient medication prescriptions. 

On top of my responsibilities as a Program Manager, I worked on developing the strategy and vision of Aspen Consulting GmbH. In regards to this task, I was responsible for generating new business as a Business Development Manager.
profile_positions.title: Program Manager

profile_positions.location: USAFE, NATO Air Base, Geilenkirchen, Germany
profile_positions.description:
I worked as an IT Professional for the 470 Air Base Squadron/Medical Flight. My skill-set consists of IM-IT Management, IT Security, Network Management, Project Management and Service Delivery management.

My motto is:
"IT is a means to a goal; always keeping the individual in mind"
profile_positions.title: ICT Manager | US Government-DoD
